Uses of Interface
org.gradoop.flink.model.impl.operators.layouting.LayoutingAlgorithm

  • Packages that use LayoutingAlgorithm 
    Package Description
    org.gradoop.flink.io.impl.image
    Contains classes to output a layouted graph as an image.
    org.gradoop.flink.model.impl.operators.layouting
    Contains all implementations of the graph layouting operator.

    • Uses of LayoutingAlgorithm in org.gradoop.flink.io.impl.image

      Constructors in org.gradoop.flink.io.impl.image with parameters of type LayoutingAlgorithm 
      Constructor and Description
      ImageDataSink(String path, LayoutingAlgorithm algo, int imageWidth, int imageHeight)
      Create new plotter.

    • Uses of LayoutingAlgorithm in org.gradoop.flink.model.impl.operators.layouting

      Classes in org.gradoop.flink.model.impl.operators.layouting that implement LayoutingAlgorithm 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  CentroidFRLayouter
      Layout a graph using approximate repulsive forces calculated using centroids as described here Very fast, even for large inputs.
      class  CombiLayouter
      A layouter that combines the CentroidFRLayouter and the FRLayouter.
      class  FRLayouter
      Layouts a graph using the Fruchtermann-Reingold algorithm
      class  FusingFRLayouter
      A special variant of the FRLayouter that combines similar vertices during the layouting, creating a simplified version of the graph.
      class  RandomLayouter
      LayoutingAlgorithm that positions all vertices randomly
      class  SamplingFRLayouter
      FRLayouter that only considers a random sample of vertices for one side of the repulsion-calculation.
